text: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 is a 2001 skateboarding game that was developed by Neversoft, Edge of Reality for the Nintendo 64 port, Shaba Games for the PlayStation port, Vicarious Visions for the Game Boy Advance port, Gearbox Software for the PC port and HotGen for the Game Boy Color port and was published by Activision. It is the third game in the Tony Hawk series. Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 was the last game ever to be made for the Nintendo 64. Less than 400 copies of the N64 port are known to exist. It was also the first PlayStation 2 game to support online play, predating the actual online hook up. ==Reviews and Awards== Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 received mainly positive reviews: *IGN - 9.7/10 *Gamespot - 10/10 *Metacritic - 97/100 *Ranked #21 in IGN's Top 25 PS2 Games of All Time *E3 2001 Game Critics Awards: Best Sports Game *2002 Interactive Achievement Awards: Best Sports Console Game ==Sequel== The last entry of the series is Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 has been released in 2002.
